text: Hi Guian. Thought you might like to see this blog and video that 3 x 16-year-olds created for me when they were at work experience with me. <http://www.unionvfx.com/blog/three-16-year-olds-3-days-1-vfx-company/> It will show you a bit more about Union where I work.

attachments.title: Everything you ever wanted to know about getting into VFX
attachments.text: During the school holidays in August, we were joined by three 16-year-olds , Reece, Aron and Louis, to learn more about the world of visual effects (VFX).
attachments.fallback: Everything you ever wanted to know about getting into VFX

text: thank you I will check it out. :blush:
